directions: Beat together the eggs, sugars, syrup, butter or margarine, vanilla, and peanut butter.  Add the baking soda, and beat well.  Stir in the oats, chocolate chips and M&M candies.
Place dough by tablespoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheets.  Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 12 minutes.  DO NOT OVERBAKE!!!!!!
title: Hobo Cookies
